bio: As a project manager in the construction industry, I’ve honed my ability to manage complex projects, coordinate with diverse teams, and deliver results under pressure.
My career has spanned multiple industries—from hairstyling to real estate—giving me a versatile skill set and a deep appreciation for creativity, structure, and client satisfaction.

With an associate degree in architecture and soon completing my associate degree in computer science, I’m excited to merge my technical knowledge with my hands-on experience as I pursue my bachelor’s degree in computer science at George Mason University this fall.

I’ve built web applications using JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and Python, completed the 100 Days of Code course for Python, and have a strong preference for Java as my primary programming language, along with experience in SQL.
My passion for technology, problem-solving, and continuous learning drives me to take on new challenges and contribute meaningfully to every project I’m involved in.

positions.title: CAD Drafter / Project Manager
achievements: Managed $20M+ in projects from inception to completion, ensuring on-time, on-budget delivery.
Led cross-functional teams of 6-12 members, enhancing collaboration and performance.
Optimized workflows using Agile tools, reducing labor costs by 10%.
Exceeded financial targets by 10% while mitigating $200K in potential cost overruns.
Produced precise technical drawings using CAD, ensuring design accuracy and compliance.
Managed Autodesk licenses, improving drafting efficiency and eliminating redundancies.
Boosted team productivity by 300% through CAD technology enhancements.
